vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σελην-ιάζομαι,
passive, to be moonstruck, i.e. epileptic, [NT+2nd c.AD+]
__2 to be sublunar, i.e. subject to change and decay, -ομένης τῆς φύσεως[Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (passive) to have a seizure to be epileptic
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to have a seizure to be epileptic
to be a lunatic, be epileptic Mt. 4:24; 17:15*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 原意:神經錯亂,瘋癲
2) 有癲癇病的(在古代,癲癇被認為與超自然的力量相關) (太 4:24,17:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 原意:神经错乱,疯癫
2) 有癫痫病的(在古代,癫痫被认为与超自然的力量相关) (太 4:24,17:15)
